description:
Puddles happen, so be prepared. From exploring shorelines with your little ones to taking on some yard work on less than stellar days, the Michael rain boots will keep your feet comfy and dry.

  • Waterproof construction
  • Removable EVA foam footbed is supportive and shock absorbing
  • Heavily lugged outsole provides great traction in all conditions
  • Kamik’s lightweight synthetic RubberHe is PVC-free, latex-free, waterproof, durable and recyclable
  • RubberHe is rated to 1,000,000 flexes and is unaffected by weather down to -32°C, offering excellent traction in any weather
  • Oil and acid resistant
  • Fully recyclable at the end of their life
name: Kamik Michael Rain Boots - Men's
